Fastrack Reflex Horizon Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Fastrack Reflex Horizon Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is a combination of elegance and utility in a seamless manner. Its 1.9" UltraVU Large Display provides a colorful and spacious visual experience while also maintaining clarity and simplicity of operation. Staying connected has never been easier, thanks to the added convenience of BT Calling and an intelligent voice assistant. The watch is more than just a timepiece; it also has a heart rate monitor and SpO2 tracker that provides detailed information about your health. The Fastrack Reflex Horizon is designed for an active lifestyle and is IP68 water-resistant, making it suited for a variety of conditions, from exercises to daily activities. With this stylish and feature-packed gadget that caters to both your style and well-being, you can embrace the future of smart wearables.

1.95” UltraVU Display

With its 1.95" Horizon Curve Display and brilliant pixel quality, the Fastrack Reflex Horizon is ready to customize your wrist with exciting new colors.

100+ Sports Modes

The Fastrack Reflex Horizon Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch has 100+ sports modes, providing to fitness fanatics with a wide range of sporting activities. This smartwach offers a customized experience for each type of exerciser, whether they like more specialized activities like yoga, dance, or even niche sports, or more conventional routines like running, cycling, or swimming. With the help of the extensive sports modes, you can precisely track and analyze your performance indicators, enabling you to adjust your training schedule and reach your fitness objectives.

Built-in Alexa

The Fastrack Reflex Horizon Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch includes an Alexa capability, which brings the ease of intelligent voice help to your wrist. Users may interact with their wristwatch using voice commands thanks to Alexa connectivity, providing a hands-free and easy experience. Alexa's capabilities are perfectly incorporated into the wristwatch, boosting its overall utility, whether you need to check the weather, make reminders, operate smart home devices, or ask basic inquiries.

Sleep Monitoring

The Fastrack Reflex Horizon Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch has a complete Sleep Monitoring feature that is intended to improve your overall well-being by offering insights into the quality of your sleep. The wristwatch analyzes your sleep habits, including length, depth, and interruptions, using modern sensors and algorithms to create thorough sleep reports. Users may learn important information about their sleep cycles, helping them to better understand their sleeping habits and make educated decisions to enhance their sleep quality.

SpO2 Monitoring

The Fastrack Reflex Horizon Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch now supports SpO2 (blood oxygen) monitoring, which adds a critical health statistic to its list of features. SpO2 monitoring examines the levels of oxygen saturation in your blood, revealing how well your body delivers oxygen to various organs and tissues. This function is very useful for evaluating respiratory health and general well-being. The wristwatch uses modern sensors to assess SpO2 levels non-invasively, delivering real-time data as well as historical patterns.

The Fastrack Reflex Vox 2.0 comes with a large 1.69" display screen, providing a clear and immersive visual experience. Whether you're checking notifications, tracking your fitness goals, or exploring its various features, the vibrant display ensures an enjoyable user experience.

Built-in Alexa

The Reflex Vox 2.0 comes equipped with built-in Alexa, allowing you to effortlessly control your smart devices, get weather updates, set reminders, and much more, all with just your voice. Additionally, the smartwatch offers a wide range of customization options with over 100 watch face designs, ensuring that you can personalize it to match your style and mood.

Sports Modes and Health Tracking

Fastrack Reflex Vox 2.0 offers over 10 sports modes, including running, cycling, and yoga, enabling you to track and analyze your workouts effectively. Moreover, the smartwatch includes essential health-tracking features such as a menstrual tracker, stress monitor, SPO2 tracker, sleep tracker, and a 24/7 heart rate monitor. Stay on top of your health goals and gain valuable insights into your well-being with these comprehensive tracking capabilities.

5 ATM Water-Resistant

Reflex Vox 2.0 boasts a 5ATM water resistance rating. This means you can wear it confidently while swimming, showering, or participating in water-based activities without worrying about water damage. The smartwatch is built to accompany you wherever your adventures take you.

Long-Lasting Battery and Interchangeable Straps

The Fastrack Reflex Vox 2.0 ensures a seamless experience with its super-lasting battery that can last up to 10 days on a single charge. Say goodbye to frequent charging and enjoy uninterrupted usage. The smartwatch also offers an exciting option of interchangeable straps, allowing you to switch up its look and match it with your outfit or mood effortlessly.
